tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Some complementary tools you might need.

imagesTool.title: Extract Text from Image/s
imagesTool.description: Upload images and get extracted text in Chinese.

pdfTool.title: Extract Text from PDF
pdfTool.description: Upload PDF and get extracted text in Chinese.

characterCountTool.title: Character Counter
characterCountTool.description: Count the number of characters in Chinese text.

analyzerTool.title: Text Analyzer
analyzerTool.description: Analyze Chinese text and get word frequency, unique words, and more.

hanziWriterTool.title: Hanzi Writer
hanziWriterTool.description: Simulate Chinese character strokes and practice writing.
